title: What are the benefits of systems thinking? - Quora

response.answer_text: Life is interdependent. Reality is interdependent. Or perhaps put another way, it’s a web. It’s a cycle. It’s a family. Attempt to look at the big picture, and include all the key elements and actors, along with their inter-relationship. The main alternative, Isolated and/or reductive thinking warps reality and is incomplete.  One other way to think about this is via the Iceberg metaphor, with various elements under the water that we may not consider, which are hidden and/or even potential root causes. Iceberg Model - Systems Thinking  If you have more time, you might think about watching Peter Senge on Systems thinking. He’s kind of the guru or the expert on the issue.
